content: dainty floral motifs stitched in thread make a head-turning crochet necklace **note ** pattern was featured on knit & crochet today details are available by viewing the episode listing 1 show 215 the perfect gifts a free pdf copy of the pattern is available by clicking here 2 when logged onto the website scroll down the page listing the episodes to almost the bottom to find the link for this pattern and remember to log in to the website the pattern pdf is available there 1 http //knitandcrochetnow com/fly aspx layout=episodesindex&taxid=108 2 http //www knitandcrochetnow com/crochet-flowering-necklace-knit-and-crochet-today-season-2-episode-215/
